title: ACCOUNTANCY
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language not Literature in English and Mathematics and any three (3) subjects from the following

Economics/Commerce,

Business Methods,

Principles of Accounts,

Literature in English

Geography

Office Practice

Government,

Biology/Agricultural Science,

Chemistry,

Physics,

History/Government

Typewriting

Shorthand
subjects: Mathematics and two (2) of Geography, Commerce, Government, Principles of Accounts and Economics.

title: AGRICULTURAL TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in Biology/Agricultural Science,

Mathematics and any three (3) of the following:

Geography,

Food and Nutrition,

Economics,

Technical Drawing,

English Language,

Physics,

Chemistry,

Nigerian Language,

Home Economics.

At least 'O' Level credit passes in English Language and Chemistry are compulsory.
subjects: Biology/Agricultural Science, Chemistry and any other Science subject

title: ANIMAL HEALTH & PRODUCTION TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in Biology/Agricultural Science,

Mathematics and any three (3) of the following:

Geography,

Food and Nutrition,

Economics,

Technical Drawing,

English Language,

Physics,

Chemistry,

Nigerian Language,

Home Economics.
subjects: Biology/Agricultural Science, Chemistry and any other Science subject

title: BUSINESS ADMINISTRATION & MANAGEMENT
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, not Literature in English and Mathematics and any three (3) subjects from the following:

Economics/Commerce,

Business Methods,

Geography

Office Practice

title: COMPUTER SCIENCE
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in Mathematics, a basic science and three (3) other subjects chosen from the following:

Economics,

Geography,

Government/History,

Further Mathematics,

Physics,

Chemistry,

Biology/Agricultural Science.

English Language,

Typewriting,

'O' Level credit passes in English Language and Physics is compulsory.
subjects: Mathematics and any two (2) of Geography, Physics, Economics or Chemistry.

title: COOPERATIVE ECONOMICS & MANAGEMENT
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language not Literature in English and Mathematics and any three (3) subjects from the following:

Economics/Commerce,

Business Methods,

Principles of Accounts,

Literature in English

Geography

Office Practice

Government,

Biology/Agricultural Science,

Chemistry,

Physics,

History/Government

Typewriting

Shorthand
subjects: Mathematics and any two (2) of Economics, Geography, Biology or Agricultural Science History, Government, Commerce or Principle of Accounts.

title: HOME & RURAL ECONOMICS
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in any three (3) of the following:

Government,

Business Methods,

Economics/Commerce,

Religious Knowledge,

Any Nigerian Language,

Geography,

Bookkeeping and Principles of Accounts

History,

Clothing and Textile,

plus 'O' Level credit passes in English Language and Mathematics.
subjects: Biology, Agricultural Science and any other subject.

title: NUTRITION & DIETETICS
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in Chemistry, Biology/Agricultural Science/Health Science and any three (3) of the following:

Food and Nutrition,

Mathematics,

Economics/Commerce,

Physics,

English Language,

Home Management.

'O' Level credit passes in English Language and Mathematics are required.

title: PRODUCTION TECH.
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in Biology/Agricultural Science,

Mathematics and any three (3) of the following:

Geography,

Economics,

Technical Drawing,

English Language,

Physics,

Chemistry,

Nigerian Language,

Home Economics.

At least 'O' Level credit passes in English Language and Chemistry are compulsory.
subjects: Biology/Agricultural Science, Chemistry and any other Science subject
